attributes.action: All employed UK carer to get 25% pay rise
attributes.additional_details: I want the givement to do thus as doctors, nurse,bus,driver have gone on strikes to me a stand to get a fairer pay rise carer have a heart of gold and need a specific personality you call us a vital serive put your money where your mouth is and give carers the rise and recognition they deserve
attributes.background: I would like to act and realise social care is on its knee because nobody want to do a carer job with all the duty when they can earn more stacking shelf at aldi or Asda call for carer to get a reasonable pay rise
